pages.description:
Your veins run ice cold as the sound hits your ears all too close.

A growl that rattles your core. Chomping from jaws who sound as though they could easily break bones.

A bear! This close, hard to tell how it will react...

choices.description: Throw half your food and run

pages.description:
The shot lands, but it's not enough to stop the beast. Angered, it attacks you before going down.



 -6 health
